author: Anna Escher
title: iFood merges with Delivery Hero’s Domicilios.com to challenge Rappi in Colombia
description: Latin America’s leading legacy food delivery company iFood and Delivery Hero-owned Domicilios.com are merging in a bid to take on the food startup Rappi on its home turf. The price of the transaction was undisclosed, but will result in iFood holding a 51% equ…
content:
Latin Americas leading legacy food delivery company iFood and Delivery Hero-owned Domicilios.com are merging in a bid to take on the food startup Rappi on its home turf.
The price of the transaction was undisclosed, but will result in iFood holding a 51% equ… [+2193 chars]
